title: Sync committee issues
body:
### Description

I am seeing some sync committee issues with Teku, with missed duties. Logs aren't too instructive, but there is a "failed to process event queue"

**Frequency:**

Semi-regularly during this committee, see validator for history
https://beaconcha.in/validator/444933

Logs

```
eth-main-consensus-1  | 2023-04-30 22:52:40.841 ERROR - Failed to process event queue for client 937039586
```

### Versions (Add all that apply)

v23.4.0

Stepped back down to v23.3.1, but committee for this one is about over, so not sure I get a clear read on whether 23.4 was the issue.
Likely not a Teku version issue, or maybe even not related to Teku. I saw some 502s earlier from Vouch re sync committee response from Teku, that's why the Teku focus. Still missing things on 23.3.1
I'm closing this. The 502 happened and the above stuff happened, but I don't think it was the root cause of my issue.
